amendment.description: To provide loan forgiveness under Clean Water State Resolving Funds to local irrigation districts.

vote.text: Amendment SA 4991 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 4991 proposed by Senator Inhofe for Senator Merkley to Amendment SA 4979.
